sectionOne.title: Maps
sectionOne.description: Our APIs, SDKs, and live updating map data give developers tools to build better mapping, navigation, and search experiences across platforms.

sectionTwo.title: Mapbox Studio
sectionTwo.description: Mapbox Studio is like Photoshop for maps. We give designers control over everything from colors and fonts, to 3D features and camera angles, to the pitch of the map as a car enters a turn.

sectionThree.title: Navigation
sectionThree.description: Mapbox provides powerful routing engines, traffic-aware travel times, and intuitive turn-by-turn directions to help you build engaging navigation experiences.

sectionFour.title: Search
sectionFour.description: Search and geocoding are tied to everything we build — maps, navigation, AR — and underly nearly every app that helps humans explore their world.

sectionFive.title: Vision
sectionFive.description: The Mapbox Vision SDK describes every curb, lane, street sign, and road hazard it sees as data. Vision's AI-powered semantic segmentation, object detection, and classification deliver precise navigation guidance, display driver assistance alerts, and detect and map road incidents.

sectionSix.title: Atlas
sectionSix.description: Atlas is truly all of Mapbox in a box — including our fast vector maps technology, allowing you to render your data at 60 fps. Create custom map styles with Mapbox Studio and then use them to power your on-premises applications running GL JS, our Maps SDKs for iOS and Android, and even our Maps SDK for Unity.
